# loadmaster Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "loadmaster" {
  server  = "https://192.168.1.10"
  api_key = "<SECRET API KEY>"
}
```

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive)
- `server` (String)
